devdoc.details: A new extension for ERC-2612 permit, which has already been added to USDC v2.2.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,b.details: Signature bytes can be used for both EOA wallets and contract wallets.

params.deadline: The time at which the signature expires (unixtime).
params.signature: Unstructured bytes signature signed by an EOA wallet or a contract wallet.
